body:
You have to lower the stack size and increase the timouts for ./all.bash to
pass. ./make.bash is shorter and skips the tests. I've written about this
on my blog,
http://dave.cheney.net/2015/09/04/building-go-1-5-on-the-raspberry-pi

wrote:
